text.config.happier-ghasts.title: Happier Ghasts
text.config.happier-ghasts.option.cruisi: The minimum Y coordinate to start cruising.
Speed multiplier while at cruising altitude.
text.config.happier-ghasts.category.roam: Happy Ghasts will roam around the last player to dismount them, keeping within summoning distance.
text.config.happier-ghasts.option.roamin: A Happy Ghast roaming around a player will stay at least this distance away from the player.

text.config.happier-ghasts.option.roamin.text: Low values may cause Happy Ghasts to obstruct players.

text.config.happier-ghasts.option.roamin: A Happy Ghast roaming around a player will attempt to stay within this distance of the player.
How fast a Happy Ghast will move while roaming around a player.

text.config.happier-ghasts.option.roamin.text: Values lower than 1.1 may lead to Happy Ghasts having trouble keeping up with their targeted player.

text.config.happier-ghasts.option.roamin: A Happy Ghast roaming around a player will stay within this distance of the nearest solid block.
text.config.happier-ghasts.option.tempta: How far away Happy Ghasts can by tempted from.

text.config.happier-ghasts.option.tempta.text: It's recommended to set this equal to or higher than your Maximum Roaming Distance.

text.config.happier-ghasts.option.tempta: How fast Happy Ghasts will move towards a temptation target.
How many ticks for Happy Ghasts to wait after losing a temptation target before they can be tempted again.

text.config.happier-ghasts.option.tempta.text: High values may lead to a generally unresponsive feel that can be annoying.
